definitions.body: one of the rivers of Eden Ge 2:13 (on theories of identity v. Comm.; also Smith:Dict. Bible Schaff-Herzog:Art. Eden Spurrell:Text of Gen. ad loc. Ri:HWB).
spring of water near Jerusalem: [[גִּחוֹן]] 1Ki 1:33, 1Ki 1:38, 1Ki 1:45, [[מֵימֵי]] [[גִיחוֹן הָעֶלְיוֹן]] 2Ch 32:30, [[לְגִיחוֹן בַּנַּחַל]] 2Ch 33:14; —there are two main theories as to locality:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: W. of Jerusalem, connected with Birket Mamilla, and aqueduct into city Rob:BR i. 239, 345 ff. Survey:Jerusalem al.;

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: E. of Jerusalem = Fountain of the Virgin, Furrer:Schenkel BL ii. 483 Bd:Pal 101, or Siloah water-system Guthe:ZPV, v., 1882, 359 ff.
